mapper.insert: insert into tbl_contacts ( id, address, appellation, contactSummary, createBy, createTime, customerId, description, email, fullname, job, mphone, nextContactTime, owner, source, birth ) values ( #{id}, #{address}, #{appellation}, #{contactSummary}, #{createBy}, #{createTime}, #{customerId}, #{description}, #{email}, #{fullname}, #{job}, #{mphone}, #{nextContactTime}, #{owner}, #{source}, #{birth} );
